SSD C5 WORKING

memo(0) <= "11100011101000000000000011000101"; -- mov r0,#197
memo(1) <= "11100101100000000000000000000000"; -- str r0,[r0]
--------------------------------------------
Input from switch -> output on LED

memo(0) <= "11100011101000000000000010111000"; -- mov r0,#184
memo(1) <= "11100101100100000000000000000000"; -- ldr r0,[r0]
memo(2) <= "11100101100000000000000000000000"; -- str r0,[r0]
--------------------------------------------
Addition

memo(0) <= "11100011101000000001000010000000";
memo(1) <= "11100011101000000000000010000110";
memo(2) <= "11100011101000000010000000101101";
memo(3) <= "11100000100000000000000000000010";
memo(4) <= "11100101100000010000000000000000";

mov r1,#128
mov r0,#134
mov r2,#45
add r0,r0,r2
str r0,[r1]
--------------------------------------------
